name: Plate From Top and Bottom
description: Creates a Plate from two Polylines.

inputParameters.name: top
inputParameters.description: Top outline of plate. Referenced polyline, Guid of polyline in the active Rhino document.

inputParameters.name: bottom
inputParameters.description: Bottom outline of plate. Referenced polyline, Guid of polyline in the active Rhino document.

inputParameters.name: openings
inputParameters.description: List of openings in the plate.

inputParameters.name: updateRefObj
inputParameters.description: (optional) If True, the attributes in the referenced object will be updated/overwritten with the new values given here.
